meanings.definition: To go back on a promise or commitment.
meanings.sent1: She reneges on her promise to help with the project.
meanings.sent2: He often reneges on his commitment to attend meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat reneges on its promise to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun reneges on its commitment to shine every day.
meanings.sent5: The student reneges on studying for the exam, causing stress.

meanings.definition: To fail to fulfill an agreement or obligation.
meanings.sent1: He reneges on his agreement to pay back the loan.
meanings.sent2: She always reneges on her obligation to walk the dog.
meanings.sent3: The tree reneges on its obligation to provide shade in the summer.
meanings.sent4: The clock reneges on its agreement to always show the correct time.
meanings.sent5: The company reneges on fulfilling its obligation to deliver the order on time.
